verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] ordered flags to fly at half - staff in honor of former first lady Barbara Bush .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: ordered] [ARG1: flags] [ARG2: to fly at half - staff in honor of former first lady Barbara Bush] .
President Donald Trump has ordered [ARG1: flags] to [V: fly] [ARGM-MNR: at half - staff] [ARGM-PNC: in honor of former first lady Barbara Bush] .
